ExampleDesign.Name: two_port_switch
ExampleDesign.DisplayName: Versal CPM5 Two Port Switch Design
ExampleDesign.Description:
This CED demonstrates the capabilities of the PCI Express Switch Downstream Port and Upstream Port modes in the Versal Premium series of Adaptive SOC. It illustrates how to construct a Two-Port PCI Express Switch.
Two Reference Designs are presented, with different permutations of the Versal PCI Express blocks acting as the Upstream Port and the Downstream Port.
